data.title: AI Prompt
data.notes: Send a text prompt to any AI provider and return the response data.

params.title: AI Provider/Model
params.caption: Enter the AI provider and model name, separated by a slash.

params.title: AI Base URL
params.caption: If using a custom endpoint for AI inference (e.g. Ollama), enter the URL here.

params.title: Prompt
params.caption: Enter the prompt to send to the AI model.

params.title: System Prompt
params.caption: Optional system prompt to prepend to the request.

params.title: Temperature
params.caption: Controls randomness. Lower is more deterministic.

params.title: Max Tokens
params.caption: Maximum number of tokens to generate.

params.title: Stop Sequences
params.caption: Optional list of stop sequences (comma separated).

params.title: Timeout (ms)
params.caption: Number of milliseconds to wait for the AI response.

params.title: Expect JSON
params.caption: Fail the job if the response is not valid JSON.
